text: Karolos Trikolidis (24 July 1947 â€“ 20 January 2022) (, ) was an Austrian-born Greek conductor. He was born in Bad Aussee, Austria. He worked at 1st Kapellmeister at many Opera houses in West Germany and Hungary. He was permanent conductor of the Ballet National de Marseille "Roland Petit". He also worked for Iceland Symphony Orchestra and was general music director of the Debrecen Philharmonic Orchestra. Trikolidis died on 20 January 2022 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Greek people Category:Austrian conductors
title: Karolos Trikolidis
